flawed_nl_solution:
If Oprah wants to have 500 cars left, she will have to give away 3500-500 = <<3500-500=30000>>30000 cars.
Since the average number of cars she gives away per year is 50, it will take her 30000/50 = <<30000/50=600>>600 years to give away enough cars to have 500 left over.
#### 600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
